JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Danish speaking Customer Advisor, Athens, Greece
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Work International, Stockholm, Sweden, is looking for a Danish speaking Customer Advisor, Athens, Greece

Dive Into The Heart Of History And Sunshine!

Experience life in Athens, a city where ancient wonders meet modern vibrance. Work just moments from golden beaches, under a sun that never quits. From mouthwatering Greek cuisine to iconic landmarks, every day here is an adventure.

As a Danish Customer Support Agent, you’ll help customers thrive while immersing yourself in the rich culture and laid-back Mediterranean lifestyle of Athens!

Work Details

Your role as a Customer Support Agent will together with your team, to handle customer issues in a friendly, effective, and professional manner via email, chat, and phone for one of the world’s most respected brands! You will have a creative, friendly, and solution-oriented approach with customers and colleagues.

Example of daily tasks:
  • Provide exceptional support and guidance to customers regarding their services and subscriptions.
  • Deliver quick, accurate, and helpful responses to inquiries to keep smiles on our customers’ faces!
  • Troubleshoot and resolve issues, ensuring a smooth experience for the customer.
  • Manage administrative tasks related to customer accounts, including updates and adjustments.
  • Guide customers through software features, ensuring they get the most out of their experience.
  • Ensure every interaction delivers accurate, complete information and maintains the highest level of customer satisfaction.


Benefits For This Position
  • Complete Relocation Package: Flight to Greece, 2-week hotel stay, airport pick-up, help to find an apartment + real estate fee covered.
  • Fixed Salary & Bonuses: Enjoy a fixed monthly salary along with attractive bonuses.
  • Career Growth: Receive full training from certified instructors and access to endless professional development opportunities.
  • Free Greek Language Lessons: Start your journey to learning Greek!
  • Private Health Coverage: Health and well-being covered.
  • Exclusive Perks: Special discounts, events, sports tournaments, parties, and more!
  • Support Every Step of the Way: From your Social Security number to bank accounts, and of course, personal guidance from our recruiters – we’ve got your back!


Requirements for this position:
  • Very good level of the Danish Language (C2 level)
  • Good knowledge of English (B1-B2)
  • Strong communication skills – verbal, written, and listening
  • Computer skills – basic skills mandatory, advanced skills like coding preferential)
  • Proactive & Quick Learner: Able to adapt to client needs and deliver top-notch solutions.
  • Multitasker: Ability to stay organized and effective under pressure.
  • EU Citizenship or Work Permit for Greece


About Living In Greece

Greece offers an unbeatable combination of rich history, stunning landscapes, and a Mediterranean lifestyle. Athens, the heart of the country, is a vibrant city known for its ancient landmarks, delicious cuisine, and sunny climate. With a low cost of living and a welcoming community, it’s an ideal destination for expats seeking both career opportunities and a high quality of life. Whether you’re exploring iconic sites or enjoying the laid-back coastal vibe, Greece provides the perfect balance of work, culture, and leisure.

Our client

Our client is a global leader in outsourcing, providing customer acquisition management, customer care, technical support, debt collection, and social media services. They operate in 88 countries, serving 170 markets, and have 420.000 employees worldwide. You will be part of an extremely driven team in awesome Greece!
Our client has been awarded as Best Workplace in Greece and as the Best Multilingual Omnichannel Contact Center in Europe!
They offer complete training by certified instructors and many career development opportunities, so this is a unique chance to advance your career!

Apply in 30 seconds and join us in Athens

Read more about the vacancy and apply online:

https://www.workinternational.com/job/danish-customer-support-agent-athens-greece-%e2%ad%90/
